channel.title: Blogs of Kai

item.title: Complexity Economics
item.description: From The Institute for New Economic Thinking at the Oxford Martin School (INET Oxford) https://www.inet.ox.ac.uk/research/programmes/complexity-economics/

item.title: Tackling Climate Change with Machine Learning
item.description: Identify climate change problems where existing gaps can be filled by machine learning. https://arxiv.org/pdf/1906.05433v2.pdf Highlights Industry ML demonstrates considerable potential for reducing industrial GHG emissions under the following circumstances. when there is enough accessible, high-quality data around specific processes or transport routes. when firms have an incentive to share their proprietary data and/or algorithms with researchers and other firms. When aspects of production or shipping can be readily fine-tuned or adjusted, and there are clear objective functions.
